This is the content of the `.deb` file:

```

drwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-launch0-all/
-rw-r--r-- root/root      1607 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-launch0-all/ignition-launch0-all-config-version.cmake

-rw-r--r-- root/root      3845 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-launch0-all/ignition-launch0-all-targets.cmake
drwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/pkgconfig/
-rw-r--r-- root/root       461 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/pkgconfig/ignition-launch0.pc
drwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/share/
drwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/share/doc/

drwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/share/ignition/
drwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/share/ignition/ignition-launch0_2/

-rw-r--r-- root/root       235 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/share/ignition/launch0.yaml
lrwxrwxrwx root/root         0 2019-03-18 16:20 ./usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libignition-launch0.so -> libignition-launch0.so.0
```

This is my `install` directory (filtering only `.so` files):
```
caguero@bb9:/data/ignition_ws/install/ignition-launch0$ find . | grep so

./lib/libignition-launch0.so
./lib/libignition-launch0.so.0
./lib/libignition-launch0.so.0.2.0
./lib/ign-launch-0/plugins/libignition-launch0-joytotwist.so
./lib/ign-launch-0/plugins/libignition-launch0-joystick.so
./lib/ign-launch-0/plugins/libignition-launch0-gazebogui.so
./lib/ign-launch-0/plugins/libignition-launch0-gazebo.so
```

And this is the `.install` rule that we're using when packaging the `.deb`:

```
usr/include/*
usr/lib/*/*.so
usr/lib/*/pkgconfig/*.pc
usr/lib/*/cmake/ignition-launch*/*
usr/share/*
usr/lib/ruby/*
```

We probably need an extra:

```
usr/lib/*/*/*.so
```
